title: Epidemiology, fibrinogen, clot properties, and cardiovascular disease risk-an African perspective.
abstract: A state of the art lecture titled "Epidemiology, fibrinogen, clot properties and cardiovascular disease risk: an African perspective" was presented at the International Society on Thrombosis and Haemostasis (ISTH) congress in 2025. Altered fibrin clot structure, characterized by tightly packed fibers, stiffer networks, and resistance to lysis, contributes to thrombosis.
